title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for r'(t)

1 point is earned for the answer

r ′ (t)=3 t 2 −12t+9=3(t−1)(t−3) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BB3@

r'(t) = 0 when t = 1 and t = 3

r'(t) > 0 for 0 < t < 1 and 3 < t < 6

r'(t) < 0 for 1 < t < 3

Therefore R is moving to the right for 0 < t < 1 and 3 < t < 6.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for p'(t)

1 point is earned for sign analysis for p'(t)

1 point is earned for the answer

p ′ (t)=−2⋅ π 4 sin( π 4 t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48B0@

p'(t) = 0 when t = 0 and t = 4

p'(t) < 0 for 0 < t < 4

p'(t) > 0 for 4 < t < 6

Therefore the particles travel in opposite directions for 0 < t < 1 and 3 < t < 4.
descriptions:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for p''(3)

1 point is earned for answer with reason

p ″ (t)=−2⋅ π 4 ⋅ π 4 cos( π 4 t ) p ″ (3)=−2 ( π 4 ) 2 cos( 3π 4 )= π 2 8 ⋅ 2 2 >0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6A3B@

p'(3) < 0

Therefore particle P is slowing down at time t = 3.
